definitions.title: n. m. du
definitions.body: loins (Ar. matnun back, matnata0n the two sides of the back, etc.; Syr. matotnoto0;—abs. ´[[מ]] De 33:11 + 7 t., [[מָתְנָ֑יִם]] Ez Eze 29:7, Eze 47:4; cstr. [[מָתְנֵי]] Je 13:11 + 3t.; sf. [[מָתְנַי]] Is 21:3, [[מָתְנָָי]] Je 13:2; [[מָתְנֵיהֶם]] 1 K 1Ki 20:32 + 4 t., etc.;—loins:

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: place of wearing girdle 1Ki 2:5, 2Ki 1:8, Je 13:1, Je 13:2, Je 13:4, Je 13:11, Ez Eze 23:15; fig. Is 11:5 righteousness shall be the girdle of his loins.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: hence place of things attached to girdle:—sword girded on ([[חגר על]], [[אסר]] 2Sa 20:8, Ne 4:12; opp., [[וּמָתְנֵי מְלָכִים אֲפַתֵּחַ]] Is 45:1 and the loins of kings I will loosen, i e. will disarm them (´[[י]] before Cyrus; cf. Che); ink-horn Ez Eze 9:2, Eze 9:3, Eze 9:11.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: girding up loins = make ready for action, [[וַיְשַׁנֵּס]] [[מָתְנׇיו]] 1Ki 18:46; more oft. ´[[חָגַר מ]] 2Ki 4:29, 2Ki 9:1, Ex 12:11 (P), Da 10:5; ´[[אָזַר מ]] Je 1:17.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: ´[[זַרְזִיר מ]] Pr 30:31 that which is girt in the loins, i.e. prob. either a greyhound Ew Bö De (contracted, as if by a belt), or a war-horse, charger, Bo Ges Hi Str Wild (with a saddle); cf. also [[זרזיר]], p. 267 supr.; text perh. corrupt (Wild).

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: girded with sackcloth (in mourning) Ge 37:34 (J), Am 8:10, Is 20:2, 1Ki 20:31, 1Ki 20:32, Je 48:37.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: linen breeches of priests were to extend [[מִמָּתְנַיִם וְעַד]] [[יְרֵכַיִם]] Ex 28:42 (P); to be ´[[עַל־מָת]] Ez Eze 44:18; loins of slaves are girt with waistcloth, cf. Job 12:18 (v. also [[אֵזוֹר]]).

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: in gen. of the middle of the body, ´[[מֵי מָת]] Ez Eze 47:4 (i.e. water reaching to the loins); so of the appearance of ´[[י]] in Ezek.'s visions Ez Eze 1:27, Eze 1:27, Eze 8:2, Eze 8:2.

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: loins as seat of strength, De 33:11, 1Ki 12:10 = 2Ch 10:10; [[חַזֵּק מָתְנַיִם]] Na 2:2 (‖[[אַמֵּץ כּׂחַ]]); [[כּׂחוֹ בְּמָתְנׇיו]] Job 40:16 (of hippopotamus); in combin. with

definitions.title: 1 a
definitions.body: (fig.) [[חָֽגְרָה]] ´[[בְּעוֹז מ]] Pr 31:17 she girdeth her loins with strength, she puts on energy with her girdle; cf. also ´[[בְּשִׁבְרוֹן מ]] Ez Eze 21:11 sigh with breaking of loins, i.e. in entire collapse of strength; so [[תָּמִיד]] ´[[הַמְעַָד וּמ]] Ps 69:24 and make their loins continually to shake, make them totter; cf. Ez Eze 29:7 (where rd. [[וְהִמְעַדְתָּ]] for [[וְהַעֲמַדְתָּ]], v. [[מָעַד]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: as seat of keenest pain, due to grief or dread Na 2:11, Is 21:3 (as in travail); so prob. also Ps 66:11 (cf. Bae; and v. [[מוּעָקָה]] sub [[עוק]]).
